thread.title: Hollie McQueen

author: Hollie McQueen
title: Hollie McQueen
text: Absolutely fantastic service from start to finish. Easy to use website. The company took time to make sure I would be happy with the outcome before production started. I was kept up to date with my order from the start right up until it was delivered. The product is brilliant and of good quality. Reasonably priced. Only down fall is tax is extortionate. Would highly recommend this company and will be using it again myself.
